resources.string: Check out this great tipping tool! Know how much to tip, track history and manage your finances! It\'s 100% free and available on Google Play, https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blog.ljtatum.tipcalculator

Came across this great tipping tool! Know how much to tip, track history and manage your finances! It\'s 100% free and available on Google Play. Download it today! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blog.ljtatum.tipcalculator
Follow Leonard Tatum, %s, for more cool apps!
